title: Beyond Language Medicine

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: That ayahuasca probably didn't hand you a resume. It likely gave you images. Sensations. Maybe archetypes or colors or strange fractal truths.
dialogue.context: Describing the non-verbal nature of psychedelic insights

scene_context: A 3-panel scene showing a bowl of soup with vapor forming spirals, as the Architect describes how ayahuasca communicates through imagery rather than words.
philosophical_theme: The challenge of translating non-verbal insights into linguistic understanding
